content.rendered:
WHO WE ARE

Established in 2005, ATS Engineering is a Sales & Services Company currently in the business of Solar Energy Solutions, Fabrication, Industrial Fans & Water Heating Solutions all at domestic, commercial & industrial level. ATS is an ISO 9001:2008 certified company.

ATS purely focuses on selling the highest quality products & best after sales services. Fair and ethical business is hallmark of our corporate strategy. Customers’ confidence earned with hard efforts of last many years is our most prestigious asset and we always go an extra mile to protect this asset. These combinations are making ATS as trusted and reliable Sales & Services Company nationwide in its areas of business.

ATS’s team has the passion to make Pakistan a prosperous nation using modern Alternate Energy Solutions and protect the environment by putting in our part to reduce pollution. We strongly believe that our country and society can become a great contributor to the knowledge-based economy of the 21st century by leveraging the talent and intellect of the young generation.

PROFESSIONALISM

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE

ONLINE SUPPORT 24/7

CREATIVITY

TRUSTWORTHINESS

INNOVATION

OUR MISSION

“ With our unanimous efforts in precision engineering through our professional services, and by closely observing our production line, We, ATS Engieering, are devoted to provide you all kinds of fabrication solutions and reliable products ”

POSITIVE REVIEWS

Clients Reviews

 
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Usman Bajwa 
 
2023-04-15
 
 
  
 
Professional people … provide excellent service and response 👍
  
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Arham's Dream World 
 
2023-04-13
 
 
  
 
I got my solar system installed by Ats. My experience with this company was very good and they have highly professional team. They are highly recommended.
  
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Mohammed Azeem 
 
2023-04-13
 
 
  
 
A professional team, totally satisfied…highly recommended.
  
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Zain Ahmed MALIK 
 
2023-04-13
 
 
  
 
I am an electrical engineer and I know the details of solar works. ATS has a team of dedicated professional engineers and they do their work in sincerity and honesty. They use A class materia, no compromise on quality.
  
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Sayed Ghalib 
 
2023-04-12
 
 
  
 
ATS team is very professional and had a chance to acquire their services for couple of my projects. They are good in meeting timelines and their work quality is up to mark
  
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Abdul Rauf 
 
2023-04-12
 
 
  
 
I got solar system installed at my house in ASKARI 14 RAWALPINDI by ATS Engineering.They have a team of professionals and execute every task in a professional manner.I am thankful to Mr Haider and am impressed by his professional approach.I will definitely recommend ATS Engineering to my friends for installation of this system.
  
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Khalid Kamal 
 
2023-04-12
 
 
  
 
EXCELLENT JOB
ATS did a great job and my bill is almost ZERO. They are a team of true professionals and dedicated workers.
My best wishes for the ATS.
  
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Riasat Khan 
 
2023-04-11
 
 
  
 
An excellent outfit that installed 10.4 KVA system at my house in DHA-1 Islamabad in 2018; good team with exceptionally streamlined after sale service: I pray for the best of everything for the organisation n remark it the company to be approached for provision of services
  
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Saqib Sharif 
 
2023-04-10
 
 
  
 
15 kva on grid inverter installed in Jan 23. Monthly average units are 70+. Very satisfied with installation and aftersale service

so far by the government.
